about.title: Integrate Health and Aesthetics into Daily Life
about.desc: Dedicated to providing users with products that combine technological sense, design power, and humanized experience.
about.subTitle: About Antora
about.line1: Antora International, incorporated in Xiamen, China, is an innovative health and wellness solutions provider integrating R&D, design, production, and global trade.
about.line2: Antora International, incorporated in Xiamen, China, is an innovative health and wellness solutions provider integrating R&D, design, production, and global trade.
about.line3: Our flagship brand 'Antora' takes 'Integrating Health and Aesthetics into Daily Life' as its core mission, covering smart massage equipment, health oxygen therapy devices, creative furniture, small home appliances, and more. Our products are exported to Southeast Asia and are gradually becoming an emerging global brand in the field of health technology and lifestyle aesthetics.
about.line4: With a full industrial chain layout as its core advantage, Antora has established in-depth cooperation with top international suppliers. From R&D and design, manufacturing, to global trade, the company has built a complete industrial chain loop to ensure efficient conversion from concept to implementation. Relying on global high-quality resources, Antora not only stays at the forefront of the industry in terms of product quality and technological innovation but also creates products that meet the aesthetic and health functional needs of global consumers through international creative design, guided by user needs, blending Eastern and Western aesthetics and technology.

service.title: VIP Customized Service Orientation
service.desc: Antora brings together a team of senior designers, safeguarding with a full-cycle service system - professional consultation, precise measurements, worry-free after-sales service, ensuring quality commitments throughout. Integrating cutting-edge concepts and industry experience, personalized needs are converted into precise design solutions; top-quality leather, fabrics, and eco-friendly woods are strictly selected, relying on advanced equipment and superb craftsmanship to ensure flawless precision in every detail. With user needs at the core, personalized full-case customization is provided, from style matching to spatial planning, creating an exclusive ideal home.
service.subTitle: VIP Customized Service Procedure
service.desc1: Customers can contact Antora via phone, WeChat, or the official website to consult with professional advisors about related products and services. They can make appointments with professional designers for preliminary consultation and measurement services.
service.desc2: Designers provide preliminary customized design solutions based on specific customer needs and spatial characteristics. Customers can propose modifications based on the solutions and communicate and adjust with the designers.
service.desc3: After the customer confirms the design solution, Antora signs a formal contract with the customer and receives a deposit.
service.desc4: Based on the design solution and customer requirements, Antora begins the production and manufacturing of the furniture. During the production process, customers can communicate with the designers at any time to adjust and confirm details.
service.desc5: After the products are completed, Antora arranges a professional delivery team to deliver the furniture to the customer's specified address and is responsible for installation and debugging.
service.desc6: Antora provides high-quality after-sales service, including product maintenance, repairs, and replacements. Customers can contact Antora's customer service team at any time to obtain timely solutions and advice.

news.title: News and Information
news.t1: OGAWA Shines at the China International Consumer Products Expo with Cutting-edge Technology, Attracting Focus Reports from Over 20 Mainstream Media!
news.d1: The fifth China International Consumer Products Expo, spanning six days, successfully concluded in Hainan. OGAWA's 'Foresee the Future' themed pavilion also drew to a close, awaiting the next surprising unveiling. As a popular booth at this year's Expo, OGAWA's novel combination of technological sense and home furnishing style has garnered significant attention since the exhibition's opening, attracting visits and reports from numerous mainstream media.
news.t2: OGAWA Shines at Canton Fair, Leading Industry Trends with Intelligent Health Technology
news.d2: The 137th Canton Fair's offline exhibition has concluded. On this important stage for Chinese enterprises to showcase their brand image and expand international markets, OGAWA Group, as a leading enterprise in the massage and healthcare industry, made a heavy impact with its innovative massage chairs and small massage appliances, once again receiving widespread praise and showcasing the strong charm and unlimited potential of 'Made in China' in the massage and healthcare industry.
news.t3: Honeywell Air Purifier KJ1000F-P22B: Intelligent Air Guardian for Large Spaces
news.d3: In today's pursuit of healthy living quality, air purifiers have become a must-have household appliance for many families. The Honeywell KJ1000F-P22B air purifier stands out among many brands with its outstanding performance and functionality. This disinfection machine, registered with the National Health Commission, not only effectively removes formaldehyde, odors, and kills bacteria but also meets the needs for rapid purification in large spaces, making it an ideal choice for modern homes and offices.
news.t4: 2025 Milan Design Week & Furniture Fair Successfully Concluded
news.d4: The 63rd Milan International Furniture Fair, themed 'Thought for Humans', revolves around the human body, sustainability, and the aesthetics of living. American photographer Bill Durgin interprets the symbiosis of humanized design and environmental protection concepts through the artistic fusion of the human body with materials such as wood and metal. This global design event is both a trend indicator and a profound return to the essence of design.
news.t5: OGAWA, as the Only Industry Representative, Participates in the IEC/TC61 Plenary Meeting as an Observer
news.d5: The 108th IEC/TC61 Plenary Meeting of the International Electrotechnical Commission was held in Hangzhou, attended by Liu Ting, Dean of the China Household Electric Appliance Research Institute, Irma Rustemi, Chair of IEC/TC61, and Ma Dejun, Vice-Chair, with over 200 experts from nearly 30 countries participating. OGAWA Group participated as an observer for the first time, representing the massage appliance industry.
news.t6: OGAWA Receives Six Certifications from China Quality Inspection Association, Quality Strength Reaffirmed!
news.d6: OGAWA has won five honors, namely 'National Enterprise with Integrity Commitment on Product and Service Quality', 'National Leading Brand in Industry Quality', 'National Brand with Integrity in Product and Service Quality', 'National Product with Quality and Credit Guarantee', and 'National Product with Quality and Credit Guarantee for Consumers' for three consecutive years, thanks to its core quality and innovation.
news.t7: From the 40th Edition of the Shenzhen International Furniture Exhibition: Insights into the Chinese Home Furnishing Industry's Entry into a New Cycle
news.d7: The Shenzhen International Furniture Exhibition brings together over 300 top national brands debuting their latest products, panoramically showcasing 11 major emerging sectors in home furnishings and consumption trends. By integrating domestic and international markets to drive innovation, it decisively dispels industry uncertainties and pioneers a new future for the home furnishing sector.
news.t8: OGAWA Launches its First DeepSeek-Integrated Massage Chair, Ushering in Intelligent Upgrades
news.d8: The backend system of Ogawa Group's 'Ogawa AI Massage Robot Super Sense Ultimate Edition' has been successfully connected to DeepSeek, which will bring users an upgraded intelligent interactive experience. Users of this massage chair only need to update OTA with one click to enjoy the DeepSeek version of the massage experience.
news.t9: The air purifier customized for China by Honeywell has been exported to India.
news.d9: Honeywell is marketing the air purifiers produced in China to developing countries such as India and Russia. Compared to China, India's air pollution situation is considered more severe, and the capital New Delhi has even been ranked as the city with the worst air in the world by the World Health Organization.

product.title: 智能健康系列
product.desc: 以科技重构健康日常，融合AI算法与生物传感技术，打造「主动干预+精准管理」的健康解决方案。将健康科技融入居家场景，用智能硬件重新定义当代人的生活方式。
product.desc1: 意大利头层牛皮与非遗榫卯工艺碰撞，模块化智能家具随场景自由衍生，每一件作品既是功能载体，亦是可收藏的设计符号——用当代z语言解构东方生活哲学，让家居成为承载情感与审美的「日常艺术品」。
product.p1_desc: 通过增加环境压力（通常为2-3个大气压）和提高氧气浓度（通常为100%纯氧），使更多氧气溶解于血液中，显著提升血液和组织中的氧气含量。促进组织修复，抑制炎症和细菌生长，还能增强吞噬细胞的杀菌能力等，从而起到治疗多种疾病、促进机体康复的作用。
product.p2_desc: 融合人体工学与尖端科技，带来殿堂级放松体验。搭载5D温感机芯、SenseTag体感智探系统，构建”检测-分析-调理”健康闭环。结合Liflex灵动导轨、石墨烯热敷等科技，真正还原大师专业按摩手法，适配全家人的状态，重焕活力。
product.p3_desc: 采用医疗级三重净化系统，集成True HEPA滤网、UV-C紫外线与活性氧协同消杀，可捕获99.97%的0.3微米颗粒物，瞬间灭活H 1 N 1 、 大 肠 杆 菌 等 病 原 体 。 智 能 微 粒 传 感 实 时 监 测PM2.5/VOC，静音模式下仅32dB，适配卧室/母婴场景。通过AHAM认证，日均能耗低至0.3度，以实验室级净化效能重构健康呼吸基线。

master.title: 创意生活系列
master.desc: 意大利头层牛皮与非遗榫卯工艺碰撞，模块化智能家具随场景自由衍生，每一件作品既是功能载体，亦是可收藏的设计符号——用当代z语言解构东方生活哲学，让家居成为承载情感与审美的「日常艺术品」。
master.subtitle: 大师经典系列
master.name: 名称
master.p1_design: 酋长椅的设计灵感的确源自于非洲部落的武器意象。强烈的原始感与张放的线条，分离般的结构，让人一眼就有很大的视觉刺激。它本身也有直接的拟物特征，例如扶手象征马鞍，高大的靠背骨架顶端弯钩般的形状，象征长弓末端的弦耳。而靠背看起来像是一个盾牌，也像是酋长的羽毛冠帽。
master.p2_design: 展现出独特的动感、优雅和蜿蜒设计，木质结构由两个互锁的有机形状元素构成。Giorgetti Move摇摇椅宛如一件灵动的艺术品。勾勒出流畅蜿蜒的线条，将木材的温润与设计的巧思完美融合。当您轻轻落座，柔和的曲线贴合身体，每一次摇晃，都似在与生活的节奏共舞，舒缓又惬意。
master.p3_design: 以近乎完美的流畅线条与极简设计而闻名，整张座椅从造型到构件浑然一体，此后也被人们敬称为'The Chair'。即便是以现在的眼光来看，仍少有作品可与之比拟。美国《Interi-ors》杂志以'世界上ZUI完美的椅子'给予其高度赞誉。
master.p4_design: ·Wegner将合板优点发挥到极致的作品仅以3个组件组成，因而得名[三脚贝壳椅]。利用乘坐姿势及人体工学，制作时以蒸汽加压方式将木材加弯，让座椅呈现出美丽的曲线，就像是微笑般浅浅弯起，简约又不失大方，两侧的状包覆扶手和弯曲支撑脚，尽管只有三脚作支撑，却坚固耐久。无扶手的设计核心，保留倾斜倚靠结构，展现出强烈之设计语言和极佳的舒适度。
master.p5_name: 伊姆斯休闲躺椅（Eames Lounge Chair）
master.p5_designer: 伊姆斯夫妇（Charles Eames & Ray Eames）
master.p5_design: 灵感源于19世纪英式俱乐部休闲椅，通过现代材料与结构颠覆创新。秉承查尔斯·伊姆斯“用惯的一垒手手套”般温暖平易的理念，旨在为现代生活打造触感舒适、缓解压力的'避难所'。
master.p6_design: 源于毕加索画作中公牛的一种形象化的转化。 椅背上的两个牛角，使其整体造型看上去刚劲有力，不自觉地就流露出了一股霸气之势。其线条通体流畅，四支不锈钢脚呈现出了一种向前推进的架势，不仅使椅子看上去优雅大方，更加强了椅子的坐感，兼具了美观和舒适两个方面。它也应证了设计师的那句话：一张完美的椅子并没有所谓的前后，它必须在各个角度和方向上都能展现出美感。
master.p7_design: 源于女性的子宫形状，其曲线流畅、包容的特点，让人联想到母爱的温暖和呵护。创造出一种让人感到舒适和放松的体验。结构采用流线型的曲线设计，座椅和靠背部分由玻璃纤维外壳制作形成自然的弧线，符合人体工程学，完美贴合人体曲线，提供极致的舒适体验。椅脚由两根弯曲的细钢管组合而成，既提供有效支撑又显轻盈。
master.p8_designer: 密斯.凡.德罗（Mies van der Rohe）
master.p8_design: 从古罗马的 “Curule Chair”（一种象征权力的X形折叠椅）中汲取灵感，但摒弃繁复装饰，以极简线条重新诠释权威感，是古典与极简的融合。Barcelona椅是上个世纪最受认可的物品之一，也是现代运动的标志，它散发出一种简约的优雅，体现了密斯·凡德罗最著名的格言——“少即是多”。
master.p9_design: 改变了填塞垫料的家具以往只能在木质织布机上织造垫料的旧工艺，获得国际博览会的金奖，以及无数的赞誉之声。扎努索的椅子有着放之四海皆人见人爱的曲线，因为泡沫切割的厚薄程度取决于人体不同部位在就座时所产生的压力大小。色彩明快的面料带来满满的意大利风情，纤细的金属椅腿从座位下方向外伸展开来，为椅子增添了必要的精致感。
master.p10_design: 极简主义和功能主义的理念，具有正统的斯堪的纳维亚风格，以其流畅的曲线和包裹式设计而闻名，形似一个被切割的蛋壳。外层采用传统的纯手工艺方式缝制椅身正反两面各是一整张牛皮通过手工缝制1000针后，完美地包裹住内壳。

teaSpace.title: 创意生活系列
teaSpace.desc: 意大利头层牛皮与非遗榫卯工艺碰撞，模块化智能家具随场景自由衍生，每一件作品既是功能载体，亦是可收藏的设计符号——用当代z语言解构东方生活哲学，让家居成为承载情感与审美的「日常艺术品」。
teaSpace.line1: 桌面的无垠百合+攒拼+生漆拼花，
teaSpace.line3: 精选木片以几何形态交错，
teaSpace.line4: 深浅棕调里藏着木材天然的肌理与温度。
teaSpace.line5: 每一道拼接缝，都像山径的转折，
teaSpace.line6: 将自然苍劲与设计秩序揉成掌心触感。
teaSpace.desc3: 却以金属般流畅线条呈现。
teaSpace.desc5: 在地面晕出花瓣状的影
teaSpace.desc6: 东方「留白」哲思，悄然落地

office.title: 创意生活系列
office.desc: 意大利头层牛皮与非遗榫卯工艺碰撞，模块化智能家具随场景自由衍生，每一件作品既是功能载体，亦是可收藏的设计符号——用当代z语言解构东方生活哲学，让家居成为承载情感与审美的「日常艺术品」。
